horror_tv_series.title: The Walking Dead
horror_tv_series.overview: In a post-apocalyptic world, a group of survivors must navigate through hordes of zombies and face other challenges to stay alive.

horror_tv_series.title: Hannibal
horror_tv_series.overview: FBI profiler Will Graham forms a complex relationship with the brilliant and cannibalistic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal Lecter as they solve gruesome crimes.

horror_tv_series.title: The Exorcist
horror_tv_series.overview: Two priests confront a family's demonic possession and work to rid them of the evil forces threatening their lives.

horror_tv_series.title: Supernatural
horror_tv_series.overview: Two brothers, Sam and Dean Winchester, hunt demons, ghosts, monsters, and other supernatural beings across the country.

horror_tv_series.title: Penny Dreadful
horror_tv_series.overview: Set in Victorian London, this series brings together classic literary characters as they confront supernatural threats and dark secrets.

horror_tv_series.title: Stranger Things
horror_tv_series.overview: A group of kids in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries and government experiments when a young girl with telekinetic powers appears.

horror_tv_series.title: American Horror Story
horror_tv_series.overview: An anthology series that explores different horror themes and storylines in each season, featuring a recurring cast in various roles.

horror_tv_series.title: The Haunting of Hill House
horror_tv_series.overview: A family is haunted by traumatic events that occurred in their old home and must confront the ghosts of their past.

horror_tv_series.title: Bates Motel
horror_tv_series.overview: A prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho, this series explores the complex relationship between Norman Bates and his mother, Norma.

horror_tv_series.title: The Witcher
horror_tv_series.overview: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, navigates a world filled with dangerous creatures, sorcery, and political intrigue.
